This material will be used for road/parking lot surfaces, repairing surface failures, culvert installations, etc.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 22 December 2022 at 2:00 pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Notice
### Background
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the provision and delivery of Type 33 base gravel to the Prince Albert National Park Staging Area in Prince Albert National Park, Saskatchewan.

### Solicitation Details
* **Procurement Reference Number**: WS3705700767
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3705700767
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: November 28, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 22, 2022 at 14:00 (HAE)
* **Amendment Date**: December 13, 2022

### Requirements
Parks Canada Agency (PC) requires Type 33 base gravel for various purposes, including road and parking lot surfaces, repairing surface failures, and culvert installations.

### Evaluation Criteria
Bid selection will be based on the lowest price.

### Business Requirements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Bidders must submit their bid and supporting documentation electronically.

### Contact Information
Tanya Gostev, Supply Management Specialist (SPAC/PSPC)

Email: [tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice Details
Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14667729?extsite=MTQ2Njc3MjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14667729?extsite=MTQ2Njc3MjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
Notice Language: English, French

### Additional Information
Note: The initial tender closing time has been amended to 14:00 (HAE) on December 22, 2022. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. The notice URL and contact information are available for further clarification.
